column1: # "mtgame_decos" remix - all decoration packages from the "mtgame" remix
# See the STANDARDS file for more information about what belongs in each category, and what does not
# N.B. deco_mtgame_dirt_dry must come before all other savanna decorations
# For everything else, the order is not important
# N.B. all supporting packages are commented out, as this remix is intended to be used with other
